title: Log into EBIS 2.5 as BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN User inputs BOC login credentials (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND Clicks login
custom_expected: THEN User successfully logs into ebis 2.5 homepage

title: Go to System Admin Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks System Admin on Left Navigation
custom_expected: THEN User is sent to System Dates Screen

title: Find and change Addendum C + Minor Contract required dates
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is in System Dates Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks Baseball Operations maximize button
AND Scrolls to the bottom
AND Clicks Edit
AND Checks the following:

Year: Current Year
"Addendum Cs can be created for next year" : Date prior to today's date (1/01/2016)
"Addendum C year defaults to next year" : Date prior to today's date (01/01/2016)
Last Day of Minor Season: Past today's date (12/30/2016)
Rule 5 Draft Date: Date prior to today's date (01/01/2016)
Minor Contracts can be created for next year: Date prior to todays's date (01/01/2016)
Addendum C Auto-Approval Date: Any Between dates, ensure this field is filled(07/07/2016  - 07/10/2016)
custom_expected: THEN All dates are currently filled out

title: Save changed system dates
custom_preconds: GIVEN All dates required for addendum Cs are completed
custom_steps:
WHEN User scrolls to bottom
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN All system dates are saved to entered dates.

title: Return System dates to original values
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is completed testing Addendum Cs and Minor Contracts
AND has returned to System Dates Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN Clicks edit on bottom right of screen
AND edits all system dates to dates prior to edit
AND clicks save
custom_expected: THEN All system dates are returned to original system values

title: Log into EBIS 2.5 as Club
custom_steps:
WHEN User inputs login credentials **( admin-sd-all/containjust357 )**
and Clicks Log in
custom_expected:
THEN User successfully logins to Club login
AND Home display for that club is displayed.

title: Opening up Minor Contracts Navigation
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as BOC or Club **(admin-boc-all/beginathens975)( admin-sd-all/containjust357 )**
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks Minor Contracts on Left Navigation
custom_expected: THEN User is brought to the Minor Contracts section of Ebis

title: Set Status filter on top of Addendum C widget to Preliminary/Not Created
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Minor Contract Page
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects the Status dropdown on the top of the Addendum C widget
AND Selects Preliminary/Not Created option
custom_expected: THEN Only Preliminary and Not Created Addendum Cs should appear on widget

title: Click pencil icon of any player on list
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is looking at Preliminary and Not Created Addendum C's
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks Pencil icon
custom_expected: THEN That player's row turns into edit mode.( Club, Date Signed, AAA->ASL, Club Signatory, Country Signed, State Signed(Only if United States is selected), and City Signed. )

title: Fill out all fields on addendum C row
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is now in edit mode in multi-c widget for a preliminary/not created player
custom_steps:
WHEN User fills in date signed
AND fills in salary values from AAA->ASL
AND Selects Club Signatory
AND Selects Country Signed
AND Selects State Signed(Only if United States is selected is this available)
AND fills in City Signed
custom_expected: THEN All fields are filled out with values

title: Click Save Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN  User has started editing a Preliminary/Not Created Addendum C
AND User has added values to all fields
custom_steps: WHEN User Clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN A Blue notification appears at top that says "1 Addendum C was saved"
AND Row goes into view mode
AND Status changes to Preliminary (If it was at not created state previously, otherwise it would remain at Preliminary State)

title: Verify widget titled "Addendum C's" with only column called "Player" that shows Last name, Roster name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club **( admin-sd-all/containjust357 )**
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps: WHEN we view the Addendum C's widget
custom_expected:
THEN we will see a column called "player"
AND column is populated with players Last Name, Roster Name

title: Verify that column is filterable using quick type
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is signed on as a club  **( admin-sd-all/containjust357 )**
AND can view the Addendum C Widget
custom_steps:
WHEN we click on the "Filter" icon
AND quick type in a players last name
custom_expected: THEN the widget will filter to show results we searched for

title: Verify that depending on the club that you log in as, you should only see your org's players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club **( admin-sd-all/containjust357 )**
AND can view the Addendum C's widget
custom_steps:
WHEN we view the widget
AND use filter on header to view through ORG/CLUBS
custom_expected:
THEN we should only be able to view players in our ORG
AND we do not have access to any other ORG's players
AND we can view players in other CLUBs within our ORG

title: Verify All read-only global widget capabilities must be present - maximize, minimize, refresh, export, quick filter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is signed on as a club **( admin-sd-all/containjust357 )**
AND can view the Addendum C Widget
custom_steps:
WHEN we view the widget
AND user clicks gear
AND user clicks refresh
AND user clicks export
AND user clicks maximize 
AND user clicks minimize
custom_expected:
THEN gear shows options of refresh,export
AND widget refreshes
AND widget data is exported
AND widget Maximizes
AND widget Minimizes

title: Verify when tender is selected Addendum C reaches Tendered State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as club **( admin-sd-all/containjust357 )**
AND Addendum C is in preliminary state
custom_steps:
WHEN User is viewing a preliminary addendum C
AND Fills out the following fields:
*AAA,AA,1A,1F,SA,RA,R,DSL,VSL Salary fields
*Authorized Signatory
AND clicks Tender
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum C has reached tendered state

OR

THEN Addendum C warning error appears
AND User selects ignore and continue
AND Addendum C reaches tendered state

title: **Verify user is able to attach file in the Attached files section of addendum C**
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as club ( admin-sd-all/containjust357 )
AND Addendum C is in Tendered State
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit button
AND Clicks the Browse button in attached files section
AND Adds a pdf to the section
AND Adds a Label
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN Attached file is now saved onto addendum C

title: **Verify User is able to click Submit**
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as Club( admin-sd-all/containjust357 )
AND Is on a tendered addendum C
AND All required fields are filled out
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks Submit
custom_expected: THEN The Addendum C reaches Terms Submitted State

title: Locate Salary Structures widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Minor Contracts Dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN User scrolls down on page
custom_expected: THEN Salary Structure widget should appear on page

title: Click Add Row on Salary Structure Widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is on Minor Contracts Homepage
AND has found Salary Structure Widget
custom_steps: WHEN User Clicks Add Row
custom_expected: THEN New Row is added to the Salary Structure Widget in Edit mode

title: Add Label in newly added row
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is on Salary Structure Widget
AND User has added a new Row
custom_steps: WHEN User adds a label
custom_expected: THEN Label is filled out

title: Add values into Salary Values of Salary Structure
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has a newly added row in Salary Structure Widget
custom_steps: WHEN User fills out all values for all Levels of Play
custom_expected: THEN all levels of play are filled out

title: Click Save Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has added a new row into the salary structure widget
AND Filled out all required fields
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks save button
custom_expected:
THEN Blue notification appears that says " 1 Salary Structure has been saved. "
AND New Salary Structure row goes into view mode

custom_expected:

title: Open E-signature Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as Club
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks E-signature button on top right of Home Dashboard
custom_expected: THEN E-Signature Dashboard appears on screen

title: Locate Signatories and Negotiators Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has selected E-Signature tab on Home Dashboard

custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is on E-signature Dashboard
AND Located Signatory/Negotiator Widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks Add Row
custom_expected: THEN New Row is added to Authorized Signatory Widget in edit mode

title: Fill out all Required fields and Check all checkboxes
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has added a new row
custom_steps: WHEN User Fills out all required fields and all checkboxes
custom_expected: THEN All columns are filled with datas and checkboxes have blue checkmarks inside

title: Click Save Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has filled out all fields on Signatories/Negotiators widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks Save button
custom_expected:
THEN All fields are saved and turns to view mode
AND Blue Notification appears that says "1 Authorized Signatory was Saved"
AND Row is sorted by Last Name

title: Find free agent player using quick search
custom_preconds: Given User is logged into Club **( admin-sd-all/containjust357 )**
custom_steps:
WHEN User types in three letters into quick search on top right of home page
AND Selects a player who is not assigned to a club
custom_expected: THEN User reaches player history page of selected player

title: ** Locate Contracts Tab **
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has found a free agent from search
AND Selected free agent
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks contract tab on the top right of player profile
custom_expected: THEN Contract History widget appears in contracts tab

title: ** Click Create new on bottom right of Contract History **
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has located the contracts tab on a professional player profile
custom_steps:
WHEN User locates Contract History Widget
AND Clicks Create New
custom_expected: THEN Create new options appear for player

title: Select Minor Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN Create new button has been opened
custom_steps:
WHEN User has selected contracts on first dropdown
AND Selected Minor Contracts in second dropdown
custom_expected: THEN New Non First Year contract should appear

custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has selected the create new icon
AND two dropdowns appear for user

When User selects Contracts in first dropdown
AND Selects Minor Contracts in second dropdown
custom_expected: THEN New minor contract for first year international players appears

and Clicks Log in

title: Find a First Year Domestic player using Advanced search

custom_steps:

AND Selects Domestic amateur player
AND Adds filter, Rule 4 Status to passed over
AND Adds filter, Eligible year = 2016
custom_expected: THEN passed over domestic amateur players appear in search
